attributes.action: Stop making GCSE’s choose kids futures and what college they go to
attributes.additional_details: I want this because loads of kids across the uk have not been able to get good grades during COVID and it’s effecting there learning and it’s effecting what college they can get into therefore I want the government to not let GCSE’s choose our kids futures
attributes.background: I want the government to stop making the GCSE’s choose kids futures

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the futures of children who have not done well at their GCSEs, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
